Articles.Content:
so, after trying to condense my mod list i've neded up with what imo are mods that i have to have though, i'm not sure what's entirely needed based on everything, was wondering if i could get some input on what i can remove from the game and still have roughly the same gameplay. and if multiple things can be rmoved and something added in to replace it that works too.

 

VV avc plugins VV

Spoiler

KSP: 1.1.3 (Win64) - Unity: 5.2.4f1 - OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0) 64bit

I don't think anyone except you is able to determine what you personally consider necessary or unnecessary, I'm afraid...

You don't need safechute in 1.2

 

Personally I'd say keep KER and KAC and toss the rest. Playing just stock is a fun challenge. But you might perceive that as too radical.

No need to ask for advice if he wanted to play stock, take the elitism to twitch.

Not sure you need Interstellar fuel switch if you have B9 partswitch unless it's a dependency. I don't know some of the mods but I don't see any obvious overlap, you just have to track what you're using & consider removing the rarely used ones. Go through your saved vessels & see what you're really using?
